title: Top 10 Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100 In 2020 Reviews

Headphones Under $100 In 2020 Reviews & Buying Guide

# Top 10 Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100 In 2020 Reviews & Buying Guide

[Headphones](https://oldtimemusic.com/headphones/) / By  [ Joseph L. Hollen
](https://oldtimemusic.com/author/dorothy-a-smith/ "View all posts by Joseph
L. Hollen")

Headphones offer a disconnect from surrounding crowds, while also providing a
connection to private calls. And there are a lot of options out there, many of
which are rather expensive. But what if you’re on a tight budget?

Luckily for you, we’ve put together a list of the best Bluetooth headphones
under $100 on the market.

We’ve done the work for you, with reviews of 10 of the best cheap Bluetooth
headphones. There’s also a buying guide to help you understand the most
important features to look out for.

So, let’s go through them and find the perfect Bluetooth Headphones under 100
dollars for you…

![bluetooth headphones under
100](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![bluetooth
headphones under 100](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/01/bluetooth-headphones-under-100.jpg)

Contents

  * Top 10 Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100 To Buy 2020 Reviews
    * 1 Sennheiser HD 4.40 Around Ear Bluetooth Headphones
    * 2 Anker Soundcore Liberty Air True-Wireless Earphones
    * 3 JLab Audio JBuds Air True Wireless Signature Bluetooth Earbuds
    * 4 Letscom Bluetooth Headphones
    * 5 Jabra Move Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
    * 6 Marshall Major III Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones
    * 7 Anker Soundcore Life Q20
    * 8 Skullcandy Grind Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones
    * 9 JBL Live 400BT On-Ear Wireless Headphones
    * 10 Soundcore Spirit X Wireless Sports Earphones
  * Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100 Buying Guide
    * Comfort Is Key If You Want To Listen For Hours On End
    * For Some, Penetration Is Key To Achieving Ultimate Results…
    * Weight Also Affects Comfort
    * Are Wireless Headphones The Best?
    * You Can’t Have Top End Audio Quality Without Top End Build Quality
    * Everyone Wants The Best Sound Quality
    * It Can Be a Pain Pulling Your Phone Out To Answer Calls Or Skip Songs
    * Budget Considerations Can’t Be Skipped
    * Do You Prefer an On-ear or Earbud Design?
    * Other Options
  * So, What Are The Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100

## Top 10 Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100 To Buy 2020 Reviews

  1. [Sennheiser HD 4.40 Around Ear Bluetooth Headphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MSZSJE9/?creativeASIN=B01MSZSJE9&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=1&tag=1stmusic-20)
  2. [Anker Soundcore Liberty Air True-Wireless Earphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07PLGZ4CR/?creativeASIN=B07PLGZ4CR&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=3&tag=1stmusic-20)
  3. [JLab Audio JBuds Air True Wireless Signature Bluetooth Earbuds](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07HGL3J31/?creativeASIN=B07HGL3J31&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=5&tag=1stmusic-20)
  4. [Letscom Bluetooth Headphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W8NDBPS/?creativeASIN=B07W8NDBPS&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=7&tag=1stmusic-20)
  5. [Jabra Move Wireless Bluetooth Headphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07MBGDZ1C/?creativeASIN=B07MBGDZ1C&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=9&tag=1stmusic-20)
  6. [Marshall Major III Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07CDZD8B7/?creativeASIN=B07CDZD8B7&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=11&tag=1stmusic-20)
  7. [Anker Soundcore Life Q20](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NM3RSRQ/?creativeASIN=B07NM3RSRQ&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=13&tag=1stmusic-20)
  8. [Skullcandy Grind Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B01BPF49RI/?creativeASIN=B01BPF49RI&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=15&tag=1stmusic-20)
  9. [JBL Live 400BT On-Ear Wireless Headphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07MQ2V6NM/?creativeASIN=B07MQ2V6NM&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=17&tag=1stmusic-20)
  10. [Soundcore Spirit X Wireless Sports Earphones](https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/x/c/QsuDoIN3Q55XIaqiOQa3r9kAAAFvffKnoQEAAAFKAXdyX7M/https://assoc-redirect.amazon.com/g/r/http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W6N4HNP/?creativeASIN=B07W6N4HNP&linkCode=w61&imprToken=piYMfgKFRI0QIfatFekTow&slotNum=19&tag=1stmusic-20)

  

### `1` Sennheiser HD 4.40 Around Ear Bluetooth Headphones

Whether you’re looking for a secondary pair of headphones, or are just on a
tight budget, there are options here for everyone. The first entry on our list
of the best Bluetooth headphones for under 100 dollars comes from Sennheiser.

Can you really get good headphones for under $100?

The HD 4.40 are right at the top of this price range, but they will feel much
more expensive. The design covers the ear, rather than sitting inside like
earbuds. This provides a better reduction of background noises.

How long do the batteries last?

The ear cup mounted controls allow you to easily change tracks and accept
incoming calls. With up to 25 hours of play from a single battery charge,
you’ll have cable free enjoyment all day. This comes together to make a great
set of headphones for flights, trains, etc.

The best Travel Bluetooth headphones under $100…

You won’t get top notch sound quality from the less expensive options listed
here. However, these headphones use aptX technologies for surprisingly good
wireless audio quality. The HD 4.40 are also compatible with the majority of
smartphones and tablets.

[ ![Sennheiser HD 4.40 Around Ear Bluetooth
Headphones](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Sennheiser
HD 4.40 Around Ear Bluetooth Headphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/616zfAHAGHL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MSZSJE9/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.2 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.2
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.2) (4.2 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MSZSJE9/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __aptX Bluetooth codec.
  *  __Full ear coverage for reduced ambient noise.
  *  __Collapsible design for easy transportation.

Cons

  *  __On the heavy side.
  *  __Not the clearest audio playback.

### `2` Anker Soundcore Liberty Air True-Wireless Earphones

The second option on our list of the best Bluetooth headphones under bucks
comes from Anker Soundcore. Their Liberty Air wireless earphones sit inside
the ear rather than cover it like our last product review. This offers more
comfort for some and creates a lighter and freer feeling.

Are these the best Bluetooth earphones under $100?

Using pioneering audio technology, these earphones provide highly accurate
audio with wonderful clarity. The noise cancelling microphones help reduce
background noise. You get both ends of the conversation from both earpieces,
with listen and talk from both.

Will the battery last all day?

The enhanced sound and noise cancelling microphones will last for up to five
hours of music. With the charging case, you can extend that to a total of 20
hours of playtime. You can even play, pause, and skip music or answer calls
with the integrated touch control.

No wires = more freedom.

With these wireless earphones, you’ll not only get quality sound for less than
a hundred dollars. You also get the complete freedom of movement. There isn’t
even a connecting wire between the earphones, and you’re completely free.

[ ![Anker Soundcore Liberty Air True-Wireless
Earphones](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Anker
Soundcore Liberty Air True-Wireless Earphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/61WMj2oNkpL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07PLGZ4CR/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.2 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.2
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.2) (4.2 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07PLGZ4CR/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __Bluetooth 5.0 technology.
  *  __FPC antenna for a solid connection with skip-free music.
  *  __Ergonomic in-ear design.

Cons

  *  __No volume control offered on the earbuds.

### `3` JLab Audio JBuds Air True Wireless Signature Bluetooth Earbuds

One of the least expensive options on our list of product reviews are produced
by JLab Audio. The JBuds are another truly wireless set of earphones. With
these, you get a lot of bang for the buck; in fact, they’re a lot better than
you’d expect for such a low price point.

Do they provide a quality listening experience?

Designed with custom EQ3 sound that puts you in control of the sound. No need
for an app to adjust the balance or boost the bass. The quick auto-connect of
the JBuds reduces a step and gets you listening as soon as they are taken from
the charging case.

Are these the best Gym Bluetooth headphones under 100 dollars?

The IP55 sweat resistance rating will keep you exercising longer without
worrying about damage to the earbuds. With over 6 hours of play per charge,
and up to 18 extra hours of charge from the case, there will be no reason to
stop pushing yourself.

Volume control without touching your smartphone or tablet…

The built-in microphone can activate Siri, Google Assistant, etc. And you can
also accept calls and keep on the move. The music and volume controls are also
accessible via a push or two on the outside of the earbuds.

[ ![JLab Audio JBuds Air True Wireless Signature Bluetooth
Earbuds](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![JLab
Audio JBuds Air True Wireless Signature Bluetooth Earbuds](https://images-
na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/71VmhqrcizL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07HGL3J31/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4) (4 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07HGL3J31/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __Custom EQ3 sound.
  *  __Over 6 hours of play per charge.
  *  __IP55 water resistant.

Cons

  *  __Limited sound quality you’d expect from such a low price point.
  *  __Some users have reported the sound cutting in and out.

### `4` Letscom Bluetooth Headphones

Marking the cheapest item on our list, Letscom produces a set of Bluetooth
headphones at a super low cost. Great for those looking for something truly
cheap. These may not offer the best sound quality, but they do have some
features.

Is it true that you get what you pay for?

These headphones offer 15 hours of playtime. That is considerably longer than
what we expected at this price point. The Bluetooth technology brings a fast
and stable connection.

We like the ear-wrap design that will keep these in-ear headphones from
falling out when you’re moving about. This feature alone makes these the best
running Bluetooth headphones under $100. Additionally, these earphones come
with an IPX7 waterproof design, so you won’t need to worry about sweat.

Is the sound quality limited by the low price?

The 11mm copper speakers are engineered with an enhanced bass and next to no
distortion. Using the latest RCV technology, these earphones ensure clear
phone calls and passive noise cancellation. We feel the audio quality is
pretty good for the cost, though they simply do not hold up to some nicer
options reviewed here.

We will note that while we did not experience any issues, we expect that these
headphones will not last very long. The materials and overall feel of the
earbuds doesn’t suggest a long life. Be gentle with them, and you’ll likely
still get your money’s worth.

[ ![Letscom Bluetooth
Headphones](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Letscom
Bluetooth Headphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/61E4B-6wybL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W8NDBPS/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.5 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.5
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.5) (4.5 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W8NDBPS/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __IPX7 waterproof rating.
  *  __Passive noise cancellation technology.
  *  __Ergonomic ear-wrap design for comfort and stability.

Cons

  *  __Utilizes Micro-USB cord charging.
  *  __Low build quality.

### `5` Jabra Move Wireless Bluetooth Headphones

Moving back up to the top of the scale in price, we have the Move headphones
from Jabra. These are another example of the over the ear style of headphones.
Here your whole ear is covered, rather than an earbud that sits inside the ear
canal.

True depth and clarity for your music and calls…

Utilizing Jabra’s signature Digital Signal Processing these headphones bring
excellent audio quality to your music, movies, and calls. The Bluetooth
latency isn’t top of the line with the SBC audio codec. Still, we think these
headphones provide sound quality nearing a level of higher end models
available at a much higher cost.

Built to last for all day listening…

Designed in Scandinavia, these headphones are built to last. You’ll get a full
day of music from the battery, with up to 14 hours of playback on a single
charge. The call and music buttons allow for complete control on the go, which
we also really appreciate.

Wireless freedom…

While these headphones are completely wireless, you aren’t limited to a single
charge. If you forget to charge beforehand, you can attach the 3.5mm cable and
keep going.

[ ![Jabra Move Wireless Bluetooth
Headphones](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Jabra
Move Wireless Bluetooth Headphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/81047Q7BNQL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07MBGDZ1C/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.2 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.2
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.2) (4.2 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07MBGDZ1C/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __Up to 14 hours of playback on a single charge.
  *  __Digital Signal Processing audio quality.
  *  __Lightweight design.

Cons

  *  __Not the best Bluetooth audio codec.

### `6` Marshall Major III Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones

The Major III by the brand Marshall provides another great option in the range
of the top Bluetooth headphones for under $100. Once again designed with an
over the ear fit, these headphones offer comfort surpassing what you would
expect at this price.

Collapsible design for convenience when traveling…

Great for those constantly on the move, these headphones utilize Bluetooth
aptX for outstanding audio quality. This provides freedom of movement far
beyond many other options, with up to 30 feet of listening range. Not only
that, but they supply 30+ hours of playtime on a single charge.

How’s the sound quality?

The Major III brings you iconic sound through the 40 mm dynamic drivers. These
are tuned for an enhanced bass, clear highs, and smooth mids. There is also a
play, pause, shuffle, and volume control provided by the multi-directional
control knob. You can even answer or decline calls wirelessly.

[ ![Marshall Major III Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear
Headphones](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Marshall
Major III Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/7118TJAtRXL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07CDZD8B7/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.4 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.4
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.4) (4.4 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07CDZD8B7/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __Bluetooth aptX provides top connection quality.
  *  __40 mm dynamic drivers for pristine audio quality.
  *  __Collapsible design for convenience.

Cons

  *  __Not the best noise cancelling technology compared to others.

### `7` Anker Soundcore Life Q20

A second option from the Anker brand’s Soundcore division is the Life Q20.
Unlike the product we reviewed above by the same brand, these headphones are
of the on-ear design. They provide greater comfort for most, with less ear
canal irritation over extended periods.

Long battery life for a more convenient life…

With Hi-Res audio certified 40 mm dynamic drivers, these headphones produce
exceptional sound quality. The active noise cancelling brings you music with
high frequencies reaching up to 40 kHz for exceptional clarity and detail.

Reduce ambient sounds for a better experience…

In fact, the noise cancelling technology reduces ambient sound by up to 90%.
The four built-in ANC microphones work in conjunction with the digital active
noise cancellation algorithm. This results in canceling out a wider range of
low and mid-frequency noises like cars. It’s also great at reducing the rumble
from airplane engines when flying.

How long does the battery last?

There is up to 40 hours of non-stop playback with the wireless active noise
cancellation mode. This is then extended all the way to 60 hours in standard
music mode. No matter where you are going, we think you’ll have plenty of
battery life with these headphones.

In addition to all the above, the BassUp technology analyzes the low
frequencies in real-time to instantly adjust the bass output. When you have on
bass-heavy genres like hip-hop or EDM, you can give the play button a double
tap. This will provide an amplified listening experience.

[ ![Anker Soundcore Life
Q20](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Anker
Soundcore Life Q20](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/61zQ40Pgf0L._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NM3RSRQ/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.3 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.3
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.3) (4.3 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NM3RSRQ/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __40 mm Hi-Res, dynamic drivers.
  *  __Noise cancelling technology.
  *  __Up to 60 hours of music playback.
  *  __BassUp technology for deeper bass.

Cons

  *  __Too large of a fit for some users.

### `8` Skullcandy Grind Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones

If you’re looking for some good Bluetooth headphones for under 100 dollars,
our next entry might be just what you’re after. These are well under the $100
price tag, in fact, you can ofter get a pair for about half that.

Headphones that show your style more than most…

The Grind from Skullcandy comes in a few colors, and these are some of the
coolest looking headphones we reviewed. You’ll definitely stand out wearing
these, and we expect you’ll also enjoy the 12-hour battery life and wireless
design.

Impressive audio quality for the price…

Designed with 40 mm audio drivers that Skullcandy tuned with their Supreme
Sound system, these headphones provide clean music playback. We won’t say
these offer the best audio quality available. Still, for such a low price, you
likely be surprised how good they sound.

Are they comfortable?

Built to be worn all day, these headphones are built with premium materials.
The solid metal headband has soft on-ear pillows for your ears. These come
together with the Supreme Sound audio for a very comfortable listening
experience.

The built-in controls allow you to play/pause music, answer/end calls, skip
tracks, and adjust the volume as desired. All of this is accomplished with
only three buttons, making for a convenient listening experience.

[ ![Skullcandy Grind Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear
Headphones](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![Skullcandy
Grind Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/81Oj%2BYqZQBL._AC_SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01BPF49RI/?tag=1stmusic-20)  

**Our rating:**![4.2 out of 5
stars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![4.2
out of 5 stars](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-content/plugins/universal-star-
rating/includes/image.php?img=01.png&px=18&max=5&rat=4.2) (4.2 / 5)

  

[ Check Price on Amazon
__](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01BPF49RI/?tag=1stmusic-20)

Pros

  *  __Up to 12 hours of battery life.
  *  __Supreme Sound quality.
  *  __Comfortable on-ear fit.

Cons

  *  __Not the best sound quality.

### `9` JBL Live 400BT On-Ear Wireless Headphones

JBL is an audio brand that has a reputation for producing top quality sound
systems. Their Live 400BT headphones may not be the top of the line, but they
provide a great option for those on a budget. Plus, they look sleek, without
drawing as much attention your way as our last product review.

One of the best Bluetooth headphones for under $100…

As with a number of other options that we have reviewed above, these
headphones have 40 mm drivers. This helps to produce the superior sound that
JBL is known for. The bass is punctuated and enhanced to make your music
really pop.  

Hey Alexa, what do you think?

These headphones can easily connect with Alexa or Google Assistant just by
tapping the ear cup. Follow this with a text to a friend, selecting a favorite
playlist to listen to, or even check the weather — all without even looking at
your phone. We really like the convenience of this.

Have a better conversation without removing your headphones…

Equipped with both Ambient Aware and TalkThru, you’ll have better calls
without needing to drop the headphones. Ambient Aware keeps you in touch with
your surroundings, which is wise when you’re walking busy roads. TalkThru
keeps you moving while taking calls, with no need to disconnect the
headphones.

All of this comes with 24 hours of battery life, and a minimal 2-hour charging
time. Plus, the lightweight design and pillow-soft padded headband provide
excellent comfort. We also really like the multipoint connection capability
that lets you plug in and keep listening even if the battery dies.

### `10` Soundcore Spirit X Wireless Sports Earphones

The last entry on our reviews of the best Bluetooth headphones for under $100
is another in-ear design. The Spirit X by Soundcore sits in the ear canal and
has an over-the-ear wrap to help to keep them in place. These earphones are
great for those looking for something to use at the gym or on runs.

Run for miles without losing the earphones…

Built for sports, these headphones have an IP68 rated dust and waterproof
protection. You can go running in the rain or sweat till you drop without
causing an issue for the earphones. Plus, the FlexForm ear hooks help to keep
the earphones tightly in place no matter how extreme your workout becomes.

How is the battery life?

You’ll get up to 18 hours of music playback from a single charge. This is
achieved using a high-capacity battery to power the latest low-power
consumption chipset. This means that a 10-minute charge will provide up to 3
hours of playback. Great for those who never remember to charge their devices
fully in advance.

Do they offer good sound quality?

Compared to some others on this list, the sound quality leaves a bit to be
desired. The dynamic drivers are oversized, and the composite Bio-cellulose
diaphragm generates highly-detailed treble. Ultra-elastic materials then help
increase bass output, but overall we’d say this is a step down from some
options.

## Best Bluetooth Headphones Under $100 Buying Guide

Now that you have read through our list of product reviews, you should have a
clear view of the various options available for under $100. Before you make a
purchase, you need to determine which features are the most important to you.
To help you with this, we have covered a few things to consider before making
a decision.

### Comfort Is Key If You Want To Listen For Hours On End

This may be the most important factor that affects your listening experience.
If you aren’t comfortable, you’re not likely to get sufficient use from the
headphones. But how do you know what to look for?

![best bluetooth headphones under 100
reviews](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![best
bluetooth headphones under 100 reviews](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/01/best-bluetooth-headphones-under-100-reviews.png)

### For Some, Penetration Is Key To Achieving Ultimate Results…

Earbuds that penetrate deeper into the ear canal offer a greater reduction in
ambient noise. However, earphones that sit deep within the ear canal can be
less comfortable for some people. These can also become loose, even lost, when
you’re moving around a great deal.

For this reason, some ears have ear hooks to help to keep them in place.
Still, some will prefer the on-ear design. These headphones don’t usually
offer ambient noise reduction to the same extent as earbuds that sit within
the ear canal. You’ll have to try both on-ear and in-ear designs to determine
which is right for you.

### Weight Also Affects Comfort

Obviously, the larger on-ear headphones are going to weigh a fair bit more
than the tiny in-ear options. Still, there can be a big difference in weight
between many options that we reviewed above. Remember, too heavy or tight of a
headset will lead to earaches.

### Are Wireless Headphones The Best?

Yes, as long as you get a decent pair that utilizes current Bluetooth
technology. It’s freeing not having a wire tie you to your device. However, if
the sound drops regularly, or there is constant crackling or the like due to
poor wireless connection, the whole experience can be ruined.

### You Can’t Have Top End Audio Quality Without Top End Build Quality

It is true that you’re not going to get top end build quality from super cheap
options out there. What you may not realize is that this means a reduction in
sound quality. In addition to affecting the durability and longevity, the
build quality can affect your listening experience with unwanted vibrations
and sounds.

### Everyone Wants The Best Sound Quality

While it is true that you won’t get the best audio quality at this price
point, modern technology has come a long way. Even for less than $100, you
find headphones these days that offer a great listening experience.

![bluetooth headphones under 100
review](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODdhAQABAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAAQABAEACAkQBADs=)![bluetooth
headphones under 100 review](https://oldtimemusic.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/01/bluetooth-headphones-under-100-review-893x1024.jpg)

### It Can Be a Pain Pulling Your Phone Out To Answer Calls Or Skip Songs

There are a number of unique features out there like ear hooks, noise
cancelling technology, and the choice of on-ear or in-ear designs for
personalized comfort.

One of these other features that we like the most is the presence of control
buttons on the headphones. This alleviates fumbling about to find your phone
to skip annoying songs and roll the volume up when your favorite comes on.

### Budget Considerations Can’t Be Skipped

While it would be great if we all could have the best in both sound quality
and comfort in our earphones, some of us would rather not spend more than we
need to. There’s plenty of decent options in the lower price ranges, though
you also need to consider durability as cheaper options tend not to last as
long.

### Do You Prefer an On-ear or Earbud Design?

Some people will very much prefer not having a small earbud shoved down into
their ear canal. Others won’t want the whole ear covered. This is especially
true for many users that wear glasses, as the larger headphones can push on
your glasses, causing discomfort. You’ll have to decide which option brings
you greater comfort.

### Other Options

If none of these headphones have caught your eye, no need worry, there are
many other excellent options available. Just check out our in-depth reviews of
the [Best Wireless Bluetooth Headphones](https://oldtimemusic.com/best-
wireless-bluetooth-headphones/), the [Best Waterproof Bluetooth
Headphones](https://oldtimemusic.com/best-waterproof-bluetooth-headphones/),
the [Most Comfortable Headphones](https://oldtimemusic.com/most-comfortable-
headphones/), the [Best Headphones under 100](https://oldtimemusic.com/best-
headphones-under-100/) dollars, the [Best Studio Headphones for Home
Recording](https://oldtimemusic.com/best-studio-headphones-for-home-
recording/), and the [Best Headphones and Earbuds for
Sleeping](https://oldtimemusic.com/best-headphones-and-earbuds-for-sleeping/)
currently available.
